activities:
Motricity receives personal data from the EU in support of the following services:
- Personal data is received from EU wireless carriers and operators in order to provision specific data services that are requested by individual cell phone users.  All personal data is acquired from either the wireless carrier’s Internet site or from the user’s cell phone via the carrier’s own network. For the most part, this personal data is limited to the user’s name and cell phone number.  In certain cases however, additional information such as the user’s email address may be required in order  to provision specific services .  The user must explicitly “opt in” through the wireless carrier in order for any of this information to be collected.
- Motricity collects and maintains human resources data for its EU employees.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities for HR data and American Arbitration Association (AAA) for all other data.
